description: Perhaps OmniCorp achieved the high water mark in WMD miniaturization. 10 grams of uranium-233 encased by depleted uranium and a very tiny deuterium-tritium fusion core deeper inside as booster. Highly experimental, it was never found out if the average soldier could throw it far enough to avoid the blast. Activate if you dare. If you don't want to risk dying in an atomic blaze of glory, you might prefer to set it up over the world's most dangerous RC car instead.
//: Only a STR 20 character or someone with throwing boosting CBMs could ever throw this far enough to use it as a grenade without YASD. Alternatively, as already mentioned in the desc, there is always the RC car.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin. You are become Death, the destroyer of worlds, and of yourself if you don't throw this very, very far.

description: This is an active nuclear grenade. Better throw it far, far away!
//: If the mininuke is based upon the Davy Crockett, then it's not fusion-boosted like this. 94.8 tons, maybe enough to reduce half a dozen of street blocks to a glassed crater. Radius and explosion damage were actually nerfed. Wear ear protection.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already pulled the %s's pin; throw it as far as you can instead.
